description: Try our easy to follow Tandoori Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tandoori Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook chicken on a chargrill or frying pan over high heat for 3 minutes each side or until golden. Serve with sauce, rice, naan, cucumber and extra coriander.
